com.here.android.mpa.mapping

Class MapModelObject.PhongMaterial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapModelObject.PhongMaterial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapModelObject.Material
    Enclosing class:
    MapModelObject

    public static final class MapModelObject.PhongMaterial
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapModelObject.Material
    PhongMaterial is used for shading a model. This class can be used to change the transparency or color of textured map models.
